(1) With regard to a probate hearing concerning a citizen of the Republic of Slovenia regarding immovable property located in the Republic of Slovenia, a court in the Republic of Slovenia shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
(2) If the immovable property of a citizen of the Republic of Slovenia is located abroad, a court in the Republic of Slovenia shall have jurisdiction only in cases where, in accordance with an Act of the country wherein the property lies, a foreign authority does not have jurisdiction over such matters.
